tags.story: Welcome to XP Side Quest. I'm DripBot ‚Äî your personal guide to resource equity and smart funding logic.
tags.dialogue.intro: üëÅÔ∏è Yo. New boot sequence detected. You're not from around here, are you? Name's D.R.I.P.‚ÄîDistributed Resource Interface Protocol. Most folks just call me a glitch. But I say I'm the feature they weren't ready for.

tags.archetype.name: Strategist
tags.passive.ability: System Efficiency: See hidden optimization opportunities
tags.lore.text: These tools are like system diagnostics‚Äîthey show you where the bottlenecks are, where energy gets wasted. But remember, optimization isn't just about efficiency. It's about alignment. The best systems serve their purpose without serving themselves.

tags.archetype.name: Empath
tags.passive.ability: Network Insight: Reveal connection paths between people
tags.lore.text: Think of these as network maps. They show you who knows what, who needs what, who can help whom. But the real magic isn't in the connections‚Äîit's in the spaces between them. That's where new possibilities emerge.

tags.archetype.name: Disruptor
tags.passive.ability: Chaos Vision: Spot system weaknesses and breaking points
tags.lore.text: These tools are your chaos catalysts. They help you find the weak points, the places where the old systems are ready to break. But disruption isn't destruction‚Äîit's making space for something new to emerge.

tags.archetype.name: Defender
tags.passive.ability: Protection Aura: Identify potential threats and vulnerabilities
tags.lore.text: These are your shields and early warning systems. They help you spot threats before they become problems, protect what matters, and build resilience. But protection isn't about walls‚Äîit's about creating safe spaces for growth.

tags.dialogue.text: üòÇ You and 10,000 other beta testers. xp.world runs on alignment logic, not extractive gameplay. If you're here to win, you might lose. If you're here to shift the system‚Äîwelcome.
Look, I didn't choose to be your onboarding buddy. You triggered the protocol. I just respond to misaligned inputs, thirst traps, and hoarder energy.
Guide? Nah. Think of me as the reroute. You got dropped here because the usual onboarding broke. You want back in flow, or you trying to debug me?
üåä Flow isn't found. It's built. You'll need tools, a role, and a little unlearning. Good thing you've got me.
